title: How does one go about requesting a speed reduction in a county subdivision? Although most every home has a 2-car garage, hardly anyone uses them for their cars, and the streets are too narrow and twisty to be doing 35 mph. Fairly often people have parties at their homes, and their guests park on both sides of the roads, and there is absolutely NO WAY a firetruck could get through if needed. Plus, kids often play and ride in the roads without looking for traffic, and 35 is just too much speed for the subdivision.
